hero.subtitle: Innovative PVC and ALU solutions for the future of construction
hero.title: PVC and ALU profiles and systems
hero.description: Abi uses the latest technology for the production and processing of aluminum profiles. Our products are customized to your specific needs, from idea to realization, providing top solutions for modern architecture and industry worldwide.

opening.title: Opening of new residential-commercial building
opening.description: ABI COMERC proudly announces the opening of a modern residential-commercial building in the heart of the city. The project combines top design, functionality and quality, offering apartments of various structures and modern business spaces adapted to today's market needs. On a special page, you can explore building details, view floor plans, 3D animations and available apartments.

other.title: OTHER PRODUCTS
other.subtitle: Mosquito nets, roller shutters, garage doors...

gallery.title: Products
gallery.description: Advanced aluminum systems for modern construction projects, offering durability, aesthetics and energy efficiency.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We are proud of our long-term cooperation with numerous domestic and international partners. Together we build trust, quality and innovation, enabling us to realize projects at the highest level.

about.title: About Us
about.description: ABI COMERC d.o.o. Bužim is a family company specialized in the production and sale of PVC and ALU joinery. We provide complete solutions - from design and production to professional installation. With over 15 years of experience, we build a quality reputation and long-term relationships with clients and partners. Among other things, we are also engaged in the sale of construction materials.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide advanced aluminum and PVC systems that guarantee durability, energy efficiency and aesthetic value. We focus on innovation, quality workmanship and fast, reliable service.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We sell and produce durable and tested profiles.

efficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
efficiency.description: Solutions that save heating and cooling.

installation.title: Professional Installation
installation.description: Fast and precise installation by our team.

projects.title: New Projects and Investments
projects.description: We work on multiple projects simultaneously - from residential buildings to business facilities. The project page for the new building will feature detailed floor plans, 3D animations, gallery and list of available apartments.

cta.text: Want a quote or visit? Contact us.

building.title: Our New Business Building
building.description: Welcome to the page dedicated to the opening of our new building. This investment represents a step forward in the development of our company, enabling better working conditions and improvement of PVC and ALU joinery production.
building.details: The new building is equipped with modern equipment and facilities to provide even better services to our partners and clients. More information about the grand opening coming soon!

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Unfortunately, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. You can return to the home page or explore our services.
404.exploreText: Or you can explore our services:

stats.subtitle: QUALITY IN NUMBERS
stats.title: Half a century of experience already

underConstruction.title: Under Construction
underConstruction.description: This page is currently under development. We are working to provide you with the best experience.
underConstruction.note: The page will be available soon. Thank you for your patience!
underConstruction.contactDescription: Contact us if you have questions or need additional information.

windows.title: PVC and ALU Windows
windows.description: We use various systems adapted to the needs of the facility: top PVC profiles Gealan S9000, S8000 IQ, sliding systems HST and Smoovio, and aluminum systems Feal Termo 65, Termo 85, 45 Mill, and Feal sliding variants. These systems ensure top thermal and sound insulation, durability and modern design.

extra.description: Click on one of the product types to view the gallery.

images.description: PVC system Gealan S9000 – top insulation and modern design.
ALU profile Feal Termo 85 – resistance, durability and elegant appearance.
Sliding system HST – perfect solution for large openings and light spaces.

doors.title: Entrance Doors
doors.description: For special requirements we use Harmo and 45 Mill systems, while for entrance, balcony and sliding doors we apply reliable PVC and aluminum profiles – Gealan S9000, S8000 IQ, HST, Smoovio, and aluminum systems Feal Termo 65 and Termo 85. These systems guarantee security, stability and functionality, with modern appearance and top insulation.

extra.description: Click on one of the product types to view the gallery.

specialdoors.title: Special Purpose Doors
specialdoors.description: In our offer we provide anti-burglary doors made according to the highest security standards, while for sensor doors we cooperate with reliable partner manufacturers, which gives us complete flexibility in our offer.

garageDoors.title: Garage Doors
garageDoors.description:
Our company manufactures custom garage doors in three variants:• Sectional doors – most common choice for houses and residential buildings, providing excellent insulation and practical upward opening.
• Industrial doors – intended for halls and larger facilities, extremely durable and adapted for frequent use.
• Roller doors – compact solution that rolls up into a box above the opening, ideal when space is limited.
All models are made of quality materials, providing security, durability and possibility of design adaptation according to your needs.

extra.description: Click on one of the product types to view the gallery.

sunProtection.title: Sun Protection
sunProtection.description: Our company produces various sun protection solutions:• Mosquito nets – reliable protection against insects, adapted to all types of windows.• External blinds (Raf Store) – modern system providing light control, privacy and additional insulation.All products are made of quality materials, durable and adaptable to the needs of each facility.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from sun and improve space comfort.

roletne.title: Roller Shutters
roletne.description: Our roller shutters are made of top Deceuninck and Inoutic systems, ensuring durability, stability and excellent thermal insulation. We offer classic and sub-facade roller shutters, adapted to modern architectural solutions and aesthetic requirements of the facility.

extra.description: Click on one of the product types to view the gallery.

stijenke.title: Partitions
stijenke.description: Our company produces quality partitions for spaces of all purposes. Ideal for space division, privacy and modern appearance, made of durable materials and adaptable to your needs.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from sun and improve space comfort.

alubond.title: Alubond Facades
alubond.description: Our company produces high-quality Alubond facades, making facilities modern, attractive and energy efficient. Facades are lightweight, durable and available in various colors and decors, adapted to both residential and business facilities.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from sun and improve space comfort.

velux.title: Roof Windows
velux.description: Our company installs Velux roof windows, known for quality and durability. Ideal for attics and roof spaces, they enable natural light, ventilation and modern appearance of the space.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from sun and improve space comfort.

category1.title: Construction Material
category1.subtitle: Quality materials for every phase of construction – from foundation to roof.

content.title: Reliability and quality first
content.description: Our construction materials department offers everything needed for modern and solid construction – from concrete blocks, iron and reinforcement, to timber. We cooperate with top domestic and international construction material manufacturers, ensuring top quality, reliability and durability of each product. Whether you're building a house, business space or larger facility, you'll find everything you need in one place.

category2.title: PVC and ALU Windows
category2.subtitle: Perfect combination of aesthetics, insulation and functionality.

content.title: Top quality and durability
content.description: Our PVC and ALU windows are made of high-quality Gealan and Feal profiles, ensuring top thermal and sound insulation. Each system is designed to provide durability, strength and modern appearance with minimal maintenance. We produce custom-made, with possibility of color, glass and additional equipment selection.

category3.title: Entrance Doors
category3.subtitle: First impression combining security and elegance.

content.title: Security and aesthetics
content.description: We manufacture entrance doors from PVC and aluminum profiles Gealan and Feal, focusing on security, thermal insulation and modern design. Various solutions available – from classic to hidden wings and modern glasses, and we also offer possibility of custom-made doors according to customer design.

category4.title: Garage Doors
category4.subtitle: Practical, secure and aesthetically adapted to your facility.

content.title: Custom manufacturing according to needs
content.description: We manufacture sectional, roller and industrial garage doors of high quality. Our models offer reliable operation, excellent insulation and possibility of automatic control. Each door is adapted to your space, with wide selection of colors and surface treatments.

category5.title: Sun Protection
category5.subtitle: Functional and modern solutions for comfortable space.

content.title: Mosquito nets, roller shutters and blinds
content.description: We offer complete sun and insect protection solutions – mosquito nets, roller shutters and external blinds (Raf Store). All products are made of quality Deceuninck and Inoutic materials, resistant to weather conditions and durable, with possibility of sub-facade installation system.

category6.title: Sliding and Fixed Partitions
category6.subtitle: Space filled with light and elegance.

content.title: Perfect connection of interior and exterior
content.description: Our sliding and fixed partitions are made of high-quality aluminum and PVC systems, enabling maximum amount of natural light and elegant appearance of the space. Ideal for modern facilities, terraces and business spaces, with possibility of custom manufacturing.

category7.title: Alubond Facades
category7.subtitle: Modern appearance and energy efficiency in one.

content.title: Light, durable and modern material
content.description: We produce and install Alubond facades that provide contemporary appearance, excellent thermal insulation and durability. Thanks to variety of colors and decors, Alubond is ideal for residential and business facilities requiring aesthetic and functional upgrade.

category8.title: Roof Windows
category8.subtitle: Natural light and fresh air for attics and lofts.

content.title: Reliable Velux systems
content.description: In cooperation with renowned manufacturer Velux, we offer installation of top-quality roof windows. Windows enable optimal lighting, ventilation and energy efficiency, and perfectly fit into modern roof spaces and attics.

residential.title: Residential Projects
residential.description: Modern residential buildings and houses with top PVC and ALU systems guaranteeing comfort, energy efficiency and durability.

commercial.title: Commercial Projects
commercial.description: Business facilities and commercial spaces equipped with advanced systems combining functionality with aesthetics.

industrial.title: Industrial Projects
industrial.description: Specialized solutions for industrial facilities, halls and production plants with focus on functionality and security.

renovation.title: Renovations and Reconstructions
renovation.description: Complete renovations of existing facilities with modern PVC and ALU systems for improved energy efficiency.

facade.title: Facade Projects
facade.description: Specialized solutions for modern facades combining aesthetics with functionality and energy efficiency.

cta.title: Ready for your next project?
cta.description: Contact us today and discuss your needs. Our team of experts is ready to help you realize your ideas.
